Package models.operations

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.operations.Operation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OperationAddition, OperationGCD, OperationLCM, OperationLimitedOperands, OperationMultiplication
    public abstract class Operation
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class to represent the operations that the solver can use to solve the KenKen

      • isValidCandidate

        public abstract boolean isValidCandidate​(int[] operands,
                                         int groupSize,
                                         int max)
        check if the operands that the solver write are valid to solve the operation
        Parameters:
        operands - array of numbers that the solver write
        groupSize - number of cells of the group
        max - (only used in LimitedOperands) maximum value allowed to put on the KenKen
        Returns:
        true if the operands are valid to solve the operation, false otherwise

      • calculate

        public abstract int calculate​(int[] operands)
                       throws exceptions.OperandsDoNotMatchException,
                              exceptions.NonIntegerResultException
        calculate the result of the operation
        Parameters:
        operands - array of numbers that the solver write
        Returns:
        result of the operation
        Throws:
        exceptions.OperandsDoNotMatchException - if the operands have not the excepted result, throw this exception
        exceptions.NonIntegerResultException - if the result is a negative number, throw this exception

      • check

        public boolean check​(int[] operands)
              throws exceptions.OperandsDoNotMatchException,
                     exceptions.NonIntegerResultException
        check if the result is equal to the target
        Parameters:
        operands - array of numbers that the solver write
        Returns:
        true if the result is equal to the target, false otherwise
        Throws:
        exceptions.OperandsDoNotMatchException - if the operands have not the excepted result, throw this exception
        exceptions.NonIntegerResultException - if the result is a negative number, throw this exception
